name: SOCIO ECONOMIC ALTERNATIVES RESEARCH AND RESOURCE COMMUNITY FOR HUMANITY
briefDescription: "SEARCH" is not for profit non governmental organization working in the states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. Our main thrust areas are Natural Resources Management, Environment, Education, Fisheries, Agriculture, Water and Sanitation, Rain Water harvesting, women development (MEDP)and other developmental activities. At present we are working with corporates like ITC limited, Coca Coal, NABARD, MPEDA/NETFISH, AP Government. Through our activities till now we have benefited more than 15000 individuals and nearly 4000 families in the coastal districts of Andhra Pradesh.
